title: Installing Gazebo8 with visual studio 2017 on windows 7

content.raw:
When I try to compile Gazebo8 on windows 7 with visual studio 2017 I have this:

-- Enable upstream CFlags
CMake Error at cmake/DefaultCFlags.cmake:64 (message):
  Gazebo requires VS 2013 or greater.
Call Stack (most recent call first):
  CMakeLists.txt:224 (include)
content.html:
When I try to compile Gazebo8 on windows 7 with visual studio 2017 I have this:

-- Enable upstream CFlags CMake Error at cmake/DefaultCFlags.cmake:64 (message): Gazebo requires VS 2013 or greater. Call Stack (most recent call first): CMakeLists.txt:224 (include)
